channel.title: About Me on Apurve Yajnik

item.title: About Me
item.description: About Me Hi, I am Apurve. I’m a Machine Learning Engineer (or Data Scientist, whichever works) from India. Till June 2020 I was working as a Machine Learning Engineer at Housing. Previously I worked at Netomi where I helped build the machine learning pipeline for customer service chat and email bots. I have been programming in Python for more than five years. I prefer programming in a Unix shell, currently using Ubuntu 20.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Email: yapurve@gmail.com Social Twitter Github Instagram

item.title: Preview
item.description: Posts This part is still under construction. Currently finishing two posts: I have been reading about Deepmind’s recent breakthrough in protein folding using ML. Will be sharing some thoughts on it soon. For a little while now I have been interested in Economics, specially Behaviorial Economics. I also did a course in the summer on Behavioral Science, which included a small project. I am doing a writeup on my learnings uptill now in the same.

item.description: Nothing to see here… Move along!
